name: Little Knight - GameJam AAIPS 2021
description:
A simple game made in under 48 hours (with sleep). Being small knight, you have to use your magic powers to kill the monster inside the castle and save the princess.

Interesting Points:

- Enemy AI (attack on proximity)
- Ability Cooldown

Controls:

Movement: W, A, S, D
Sprint: Left-Shift
Sword Attack: Left-Click
Q: Stone Monster Attack
E: Ice Monster Attack
R: Bomb Attack
Space: Ultimate Fire Dragon Attack
ESC: Close game
